1.content:
Awakening to the sound of his alarm clock that sat on the night table beside his bed, Thomas, shut of the alarm clock and crawled out of bed, proceeding to go to the bathroom and take a shower.
Entering the bathroom he turned on the hot water, undressed, and stared in the mirror at his reflection.
Seeing his well muscled body, his short slightly spiky light brown hair, and his small brown eyes. Finished looking at his reflection he entered the shower to bathe.
Exiting the shower he got dressed and made his way to the kitchen of his house, to cook breakfast.
Only to be interrupted by his television showcasing an Alert to the citizens of Las Vegas, approaching the television he turned up the volume to hear the newswoman speak.

"This is Beverley Clang, reporting to you live from the Vegas strip. Which approximately twenty minutes ago was assaulted by an unknown source. As you can see behind me firefighters are attempting to put out the fire encasing multiple buildings that line the strip.
At this moment 32 deaths have been confirmed. On top of dozens of wounded people, covered with third degree burns who have been rushed to hospitals for immediate care.The source responsible for this destruction is still unknown.
Witnesses of the attack claim the one responsible wasn't human, one witness who claims to have got a good look at the creature says it had a metal body with electricity covering It head to toe. These claims however police say are unverified and likely untrue.
We'll continue to update you to the situation as soon as more information becomes available.
Until then we'll return you to your regular broadcasting already in progress."

Muting the television Thomas, sat down on the couch that was positioned in front of the Tv to take in what he had just seen and heard.
A few minutes later he rose to his feet, headed into his basement, and removed the dark blue body suit and hover board from the closet he stored them in.
Having put on the full body suit that consisted of boots, leggings, body jacket, gloves, and a mask he grabbed the hover board and existed his two story house, activated/mounted the board, and headed to the Vegas strip, to investigate.
1.title: An Assault On Vegas.

11.content:
As he flew to the scene of the crime, he thought about what the reporter had said about one of the witnesses claiming the attacker wasn't human.
Thinking to himself he thought.
"If the one responsible for the attack is in fact something other than human, what could it be? More importantly what's it all capable of doing? And what does it want?"

Seeing that he was near the scene of the crime, he flew to the top of a near by building and dismounted his board.
Turning on his mask (which have a built in zoom/x-ray/infrared capabilities) he gazed down at the damaged area below that was blocked off to civilians by police.
Looking around he saw the firefighters trying to put out the fire that engulfed several buildings, continuing to look around he saw a giant hole in the side of one of the casinos concrete walls, as well as turned over cars, downed telephone polls, and big black burn marks all over the destroyed area.
Switching on the x-ray function of his mask he began looking inside the casino.
Looking around the destroyed interior he noticed the electric box on the wall was opened and the only thing not in pieces.
"Odd" He thought as he resumed scoping out the interior of the building only to come to a halt when he saw a second giant hole in the second floor wall leading out of the building.
Shutting off the x-ray function of his mask, he remounted his hover board, and flew to the other side of the casino, to see if he could find where the attacker went.
11.title: Scene of the crime.

111.content:
Arriving on the other side of the casino, he noticed a path of destruction, following the path he found himself in an abandoned part of town.
Descending to the ground he dismounted his board and begun stealthily searching the area.
Hearing a noise come from one of the abandoned warehouses, he slowly approached the building, and entered.
Once inside he took cover behind a shipping crate, poking his head up he surveyed the area.
Seeing nothing but crates, rats and a forklift, he assumed it must have been a rat that he had heard, and rose to his feet, heading toward the exit.
As he walked to the door of the abandoned warehouse, he heard what sounded like metal scraping against concrete.
Turning around he saw a blue shipping crate flying threw the air toward him.
Jumping to the side he avoided being hit, and watched as the crate plowed threw the building taking out half the wall that it hit.
Looking back at the direction the crate came from he saw a tall lanky robotic entity, whose body was covered in a silver colored metal.
"This must be the thing responsible for the attack." Thought Midnight.
Seeing the robotic entity walking toward him, he braced himself readying to fight.
As the entity picked up speed and begun charging at him, he waited until he got within 10 feet of him before jumping up on top of a nearby crate.
Jumping off the crate into the air, he clenched his right fist, aiming to punch the entity that came to a halt in the back of it's head.
As he descended the entity turned around, and with it's right hand smacked him out of the air, and into the crate he had jumped off of.
Laying on the ground, he felt his feet being grabbed, seconds later he was being swung around in a circle at high speed, then let go causing him to fly across the building and crash threw the wall landing outside in a pile of debris.
In slight pain he slowly rose to his feet and saw the entity only a few feet away picking up another crate.
As the entity threw the crate, Midnight, heard it yell
"Prepare to die at the hands of Syphon."
Dodging the air bound crate, Midnight, lunged forward and tackled the entity, followed by dealing out several punches to it's head.
As Midnight, continued to punch the entity, the entity placed it's right hand against his chest, and discharged an electric blast that sent Midnight, flying into the air.
Rising to it's feet the entity walked over to Midnight, who laid face up on the ground, starring up in horror at the entity standing over his body who raised it's right hand and smirked as his hand retracted only to be replaced by a long metal blade.
Preparing to impale Midnight, with the blade, it pulled back it's hand and lined it up with Midnights, neck.
As it was about bring down it's hand and kill Midnight, the entity began to feel it's body weaken, realizing his power cells were nearly out of power and needed to be recharged, the entity retracted the blade and fled the area to recharge.
111.title: The First Confrontation.

1111.content:
Still in pain Midnight, rose to his feet heading towards his hover board to look for the entity.
Mounting the board he searched the city for hours but was unable to find the entity.
Deciding to take a break he flew back to his house to gather his thoughts and figure out what he was up against and where it might have gone.
Arriving at his house, he entered and walked down into his basement.
Sitting down in the chair next to his desk, he removed his mask, setting it down beside the computer that sat on the desk, and begun thinking to himself.
"I don't seem to have sustained any serious injuries from the fight. Thankfully my bodysuit absorbed most of the damage. I wonder what the hell that thing was. Whatever it is it's no pushover. What did it call itself? Syphon? Yeah that's it."
Typing into the computer Midnight, entered Syphon, into the blank page and begun to jot down all that he's learned about him so far.

"Based on what I know so far it's got at least some intelligence, is immensely strong, and apparently can control and redirect the electricity in it's body. He's at least 7 feet tall, covered in a silver metal like body casing, and is equipped with a long metal blade in his right arm.
After electrocuting me it seemed to have lost energy. Which means it must run on electricity. Which would explain why the electric box at the casino was unharmed and why there was no electricity in the area. He absorbed the electricity being pumped into the building so he could charge his power cells. He must need electricity to function. If that's the case then he'll need to feed again and continue to do so often."

Having finished typing, Midnight, leaned back in his chair thinking to himself.
"If Syphon, needs to feed on electricity to function, he must be a robot of some sort, but who built him and why? Perhaps i can get him to tell me, as soon as i find him again. He's in need of fuel so he has to feed soon. But when and where? Is the question. Guess I'll have to explore the city until I find him"

Getting up from the chair he picked up his mask and put it back on as he walked up the stairs.
Exiting the basement he walked into his living room and saw the tv that he left on earlier had another alert on it.
Grabbing the remote he unmuted the tv and listened to the reporter say.
"This is Beverly Clang, reporting to you live from downtown Las Vegas, where just moments ago police entered a standoff with a robotic like creature. The robotic like creature has reportedly killed several officers and shows no sign in surrendering. The entire area has been blocked off, and at this moment we're unable to see what's going on."

Without wasting any time he rushed out of his house, mounted his board, and flew to downtown Las Vegas.
1111.title: Finding Syphon.

11111.content:
Arriving downtown Midnight, saw turned over cars, destroyed buildings, and bodies all around.
Scoping out the area he saw a swarm of police, shooting at Syphon, who was making his way to the nearby power station.
Seeing the police, failing in their attempt to stop the robotic monstrosity, Midnight, flew his board down beside them, and yelled.
"Your bullets aren't going to do any good. I suggest you stop shooting, and get everyone out of the area."
"Who the hell are you and what are you doing here?" Shouted back one of the cops.
"The name is Midnight, and I'm here to take that monstrosity down."
"Just how do you propose on doing that?"
"Look I don't have time to explain things to you, that thing is going to the power station to absorb the electricity from it. I have to stop him before he gets that far, now go get everyone out of the area and leave him to me."
Obeying the masked man, the officer shouted "You heard the man let's go."
As the officers fled Midnight, raced after Syphon, catching up to him, he jumped off his board and tackled him to the ground.
"Enough" Said Midnight, as he struggled to hold Syphon, down.
"I don't think so." Replied Syphon, as he smacked the back of his head against Midnight's, face.
Tumbling backwards onto his ass from the blow he just received, he quickly got up and saw Syphon, rising to his feet.
"You got lucky earlier, but this time you're not going to survive." Snarled Syphon.
"Don't be so sure about that." Replied midnight.
Bringing his hands to his side Syphon, retracted both his hands replacing them with long metal blades as he yelled "Prepare to die!"
Recoiling Midnight, prepared to defend himself.
Syphon, began swinging both hands in a swiping motion in an attempt to hit his opponent.
While dodging the attacks Midnight, countered by blocking Syphon's right hand as it swung toward him with his own right hand, followed by delivering a kick to his abdomen sending Syphon, to the ground.
Quickly getting up Syphon, jumped 10ft into the air in an attempt to stab Midnight, from above.
Managing to doge Syphon's right hang blade that came down toward his head and pierced threw the road, Midnight, braced himself for the next attack.
Forcefully pulling out his blade that was embedded in the road, Syphon, began to walk toward Midnight, only to begin stumbling.
"Damn it! I'm almost out of energy, I need more." Muttered Syphon, to himself.
Seeing that Syphon, was barely able to move Midnight, went in for the attack upper cutting Syphon, sending him flying up in the air and crashing down to the ground a few seconds later.

Approaching Syphon, who was laying face up on the ground, Midnight, slammed his right foot down on his chest.
"It's over you're finished."
Stealthily moving his right hand Syphon, managed to stab Midnight, in the leg.
Pulling back his leg and falling to the ground, Midnight, grabbed his injured leg with both hands letting out slight moans of pain.
Rising to his feet Syphon, replied "I'm far from being finished." and began to slowly make his way to the power plant to feed.
11111.title: Round 2.

111111.content:
As Midnight, attempted get up off the ground he felt an immense pain run threw out his leg, struggling to stand he let out a groan.
Managing to shrug off the pain Midnight, made his way to his board, mounting it he flew toward the massive power plant.
Arriving at the entrance of the power plant Midnight, saw the entrance gate had been torn apart.
Flying above the power plat Midnight, turned on the x-ray function of his mask allowing him to see inside the power plant.
Within seconds he spotted Syphon, on the second floor of the building.
Descending to the ground, Midnight, dismounted his board, raced into the building, and ran up the stairs in hopes of stopping Syphon, before he recharges.
Pursuing Syphon, Midnight, found himself on the top floor of the power plant, spotting Syphon, on the catwalk that led out of the building to the hundreds of power lines that surrounded the area.
Carefully walking across the catwalk Midnight, came to the end and encountered Syphon, who was holding one off one of the black cable lines that he removed from it's tower.
"Too late!" Shouted Syphon, as he began absorbing the electricity that flowed threw the cable.
Within seconds Syphon, was fully charged.
"Laughing as he felt the power run threw his body Syphon, said "Are you ready to die?"
"I've no intentions on dying by your hands." replied Midnight.
"Oh really? Do you honestly think you're going to be the one who reigns victorious in this fight?"
"Of course. I refuse to lose to a bucket of bolts like you."
"Hmph I like your optimism, too bad it's not going to do you any good. You see unlike before I'm fully charged now, you're not going to have as easy of a time fighting me as you did before."
"Hmph before I put you down, tell me who built you?"
"An moronic scientist who actually thought he could control me"
"What scientist?"
"I don't know nor do I care?"
"Tell me what are you trying to achieve?"
"I wasn't aware that I was trying to achieve anything."
"Then what's the point in any of this?"
"The point? The point is there isn't one. I just like to have fun."
"Fun? That's all this is to you? You've killed dozens of people, and destroyed entire building for nothing but fun?"
"That's right and I plan on destroying even more buildings and killing even more, humans."
"Not if I have anything to do about it."
"Pfft I'm threw talking to you. You'll die here and now."
"Doubtful."
Letting out a vicious scream Syphon, charged toward Midnight.
111111.title: The Final Showdown Part 1.

1111111.content:
Charging toward Midnight, Syphon, swung his right hand in an attempt to punch Midnight, off of the catwalk.
Jumping backwards Midnight, dodged the punch.
Only to be tackled by Syphon, who lunged forward knocking him to the ground.
Pinning Midnight, down Syphon, began delivering several blows to Midnight's head with both hands.
Having finished his onslaught of punches Syphon, picked up the dazed hero by his neck and threw him off the catwalk down toward the ground below.
Assuming the fall would kill him, Syphon, proceeded to make his way out of the building to continue his destruction in the city.
As he walked out of the building he was struck in the side of the head causing him to fall to the ground.
Shrugging off the hit he looked up to see Midnight, standing on his hover board holding a bar of steel.
"How did you survive the fall?"
"Simple my hover board operates by a remote control located in my boots, my boots signaled my board that I was I off my feet and falling threw the air, so it instinctively came to my rescue."
"Blah I guess this time I'll have to be sure I kill you."
Rising to his feet Syphon, generated a ball of blue lightning in both of his hands.
Without saying a word Syphon, launched the balls of lightning from his hands toward Midnight.
Avoiding being hit by the balls of lightning that crackled as they flew by him Midnight, attempted to fly close enough to hit Syphon, with the pipe he held in his hands.
Within a few feet of him Midnight, (holding the pipe in his right hand) swung it toward Syphon's, head only to be thrown off his board by Syphon, who managed to grab hold of the pipe as Midnight, swung it at him.
Quickly getting up Midnight, saw Syphon, generating two more electric balls in his hands.
Realizing getting hit by one has the potential to kill him Midnight, leaped behind a storage shed.
"Coward! Come out and fight me." Screamed Syphon.
Trying to figure out what to do Midnight, looked around the area and saw another metal pipe on the ground that gave him an idea.
Grabbing the pipe Midnight, walked out from behind the shed ready to battle.
"Hahaha another pipe? The last one didn't help you what makes you think this one will?"
"You'll see."
Without saying another word Syphon, shot the electric ball from his right hand at Midnight, who swung the pipe hitting the electric ball, sending it flying back at syphon, who it hit sending him flying backwards several hundred feet.
"Looks like a homerun." Muttered Midnight, to himself.
Just then he saw bolts of electricity sputtering around wildly from where Syphon, had landed.
Not wasting a second he raced toward the sputtering electricity.
Arriving he saw Syphon's body laying on the ground with electricity sputtering from his chest.
As the electricity stopped shooting from his chest Midnight, slowly approached him.
Looking down at Syphon, Midnight, saw his eye lights begin to short circuit and shut off.
Realizing the electric ball that he shot back at Syphon, must have sent an over powering electrical surge to his power cells causing his body to overload and shutdown Midnight, let out a sight of relief.
"It's over." He thought to himself as he walked to his hover board.
Mounting his board he saw that a swat team was approaching the area, not wanting to stick around Midnight, flew his board away from the site heading back to his house leaving Syphon's body to them.
1111111.title: The Final Showdown Part 2.

11111111.content:
Arriving back at his house Midnight, made his way into the living room, removing only his mask and dropping it on the floor, he collapsed on the couch ass first.
"It's been a long day. Time to relax." Midnight, thought to himself.
Reaching for the tv remote, he turned the tv to his favorite station, and got comfortable as his Favorite tv show just happened to be on.
11111111.title: Aftermath,

info.brief_description: The story about a crusader with super powers named Midnight who fights crime.
info.description:
ISSUE TITLE
A ROBOTIC MONSTROSITY.


This is the first story in a series of stories about an ex scientist named Thomas Lang, who was forced to watch his wife and daughter be killed.
Enraged he created and injected himself with a super serum that gave him enhanced strength/speed/senses. In addition to creating a body suit equipped with various utility's and a hi-tech hover board that he uses to fly around the city of Las Vegas.

Seeking to bring the man responsible for the murder of his family to justice, and to end the crime that runs rampant threw out the city of Las Vegas, he's taken on the secret identity of Midnight.
